note: My childhood changed in a moments time with my first comic book 48 years ago. No matter where I went, I felt sealed away from peer acceptability. Once home after school, I entered a world of my superheroes that never did anything wrong. I felt a kinship as one their team members and today as a therapist I still have this connection that continues to influence and guide me. Comic books are a goto treatment tool still and my client's receptivity continues to exhibit the endless value if our comics
